meanings.definition: Thysanurans: small, wingless insects with long antennae
meanings.sent1: In the garden, the thysanurans scurried under the rocks.
meanings.sent2: I spotted a thysanurans crawling along the bathroom floor.
meanings.sent3: The thysanurans decided to have a race to see who could reach the end of the leaf first.
meanings.sent4: The thysanurans in the dark corners of the basement seemed like tiny aliens exploring a new world.
meanings.sent5: The long antennae of the thysanurans waved gracefully as they moved through the grass.

meanings.definition: Thysanurans: a type of arthropod commonly found in damp environments
meanings.sent1: The thysanurans scuttled around the wet soil after the rain.
meanings.sent2: Damp caves are often home to thysanurans seeking shelter.
meanings.sent3: The thysanurans threw a pool party in the soggy garden soil.
meanings.sent4: The thysanurans in the damp forest were like tiny adventurers exploring a mysterious land.
meanings.sent5: The thysanurans' presence in the moist basement indicated a need for better ventilation.
